name: MetalGearScanlon:RiseOfTheGFB
description:
A GiantBomb fan game.

You play as Metal Gear Scalon and must help Dan Ryckert get his Pax belt back.

Controls are:

'WASD' for movement

Mouse for Aim and Shoot

E for healing.

'[' and ']' switch weapons.

Made by Michael McBreen

GiantBomb username: malestrom
